Project.name: AsyncCommand Utility for Haxe
Project.Description: The AsyncCommand utility offers a solution to the problem of executing a series of commands each of which may need to complete one or more asynchronous operations before the next command is executed.
Project.ReleaseNotes: Features in Version 1.0 * A port of the AsyncCommand Utility for ActionScript 3 * Standard and MultiCore versions are included.
Project.Installation: Prerequisites * You must have Haxe installed. * You must have PureMVC Haxe Standard or MultiCore installed. Installing the Project Source Code From the archive * Download the latest source code archive. * Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance: c:\development\ * You will see a AsyncCommand_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance: c:\development\AsyncCommand_X_Y From the Repository * Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
